"Task Tamer": A printer that can recognize when you're feeling jealous and offers to take on some of your tasks for you. It can scan your schedule and prioritize your most pressing tasks, printing them out for you to tackle with ease.
"Task Tracker": A printer that tracks your progress and helps you stay on top of your tasks. It can print out to-do lists, progress charts, and even motivational quotes to keep you motivated.

"Task Master": A printer that takes on your most daunting tasks and completes them for you. It can print out detailed instructions and even do the work for you, so you can focus on more important things.
"Task Mentor": A printer that offers personalized task management advice. It can print out customized to-do lists, schedules, and even motivational messages to help you stay on track.

"Task Translator": A printer that can translate your tasks into a more manageable format. It can take your long list of tasks and break them down into smaller, more manageable steps, printing them out for you to tackle one by one.
